Text: how come flac is bcoming so popular these days? isn't mp3 better and can be used a lot easier (ie, can be played on more playyers, smaller in size, easier to convert to 128 bitrate, etc)

People prefer to listen to music in FLAC because it employs lossless compression.  This means it maintains the same sound quality as the source. 

mp3 uses lossy compression and even at higher bit rates it will lose some of the subtlety of the music.  

If your music player doesn't play FLAC, I suggest getting one that does.  Otherwise you can look for a torrent that is already in mp3 or convert these files.
